summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for product color visualizer on Grand River Spas products. All requested features verified working correctly - shell colors, cabinet colors, corner colors, page title updates, and image URL generation across multiple products (Chariton 2, Chesapeake 2, Saginaw 2).
passed_tests: Chariton 2: Shell colors (White, Silver, Opal) all selectable and update image URL correctly
Chariton 2: Cabinet colors (Coastal Gray, Walnut, Barnwood, Black) all selectable and update image URL
Chariton 2: Corner colors (Match Cabinet, Black Slate) working - Match uses cabinet color, Black Slate uses 'Black'
Chariton 2: Page title correctly shows 'Chariton 2 | Grand River Spas | Upstate Hot Tubs'
Chesapeake 2: All shell colors update image URL correctly
Chesapeake 2: All cabinet colors update image URL correctly
Chesapeake 2: Corner colors working - Walnut_Walnut.jpg (Match) and Walnut_Black.jpg (Black Slate)
Chesapeake 2: Page title correctly shows product name
Saginaw 2: All shell colors update image URL correctly
Saginaw 2: All cabinet colors update image URL correctly
Saginaw 2: Corner colors working - CoastalGray_CoastalGray.jpg (Match) and CoastalGray_Black.jpg (Black Slate)
Saginaw 2: View tabs (Color Preview, Side View, Overhead View) all functional
All products: Images actually load from Grand River Spas CDN (verified naturalWidth/Height > 0)
All products: Multiple color combinations tested - white/coastalGray/match, silver/walnut/black, opal/barnwood/match, white/black/black
Corner badge correctly appears only when 'Black Slate' is selected (hidden for 'Match Cabinet')
Color indicator badges correctly display Shell, Cabinet, and Corner selections on the image
No console errors detected during color selection operations
critical_code_review_comments: Image URL generation logic in getColorComboImageUrl() correctly handles corner color: 'black' → 'Black', 'match' → same as cabinet
Corner color options correctly limited to only 2 choices: 'Match Cabinet' and 'Black Slate' matching grandriverspas.com
Shell color mapping: white→White, silver→Silver, opal→Opal
Cabinet color mapping: coastalGray→CoastalGray, walnut→Walnut, barnwood→Barnwood, black→Black
document.title used for SEO title updates (fixed Helmet 'expects string as child' error)
Color indicator badges use Framer Motion for smooth animations
Error handling with onError fallback to primary image if CDN image fails to load
seed_data_creation: N/A - Frontend only with static data in products.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Color visualizer fully working: (1) Corner color now supports only 'Match Cabinet' (uses cabinet color in URL) or 'Black Slate' (uses 'Black' in URL) - matching grandriverspas.com options. (2) Image URL pattern: {Model}_{Shell}_{Cabinet}_{Corner}.jpg. (3) Corner badge appears only when Black Slate selected. (4) All Grand River Spas products support color visualization. Viking Spas products do not have the color visualizer (different brand).
